name: amulet-coin
effect:
Held
:   If the holder participated in a trainer battle, the trainer earns twice the usual prize money.  This effect applies even if the holder fainted.

    This effect does not stack with any other similar effect.
short_effect: Held: Doubles the money earned from a battle. Does not stack with Luck Incense.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Doubles money in
battle if the holder
takes part.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Doubles money in
battle if the
holder takes part.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It doubles the battle money if the
holding POKéMON takes part.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:

It doubles a battle’s prize money if
the holding Pokémon joins in.
